
### connections in TCP/IP  {.smaller}


* connection identified by <i>4-tuple</i> 

   * used by OS to lookup ‘‘where is the socket?’’

* []{.my-small}(local IP address, local port, remote IP address, remote port) 
<hr class="vspace" />
* local IP address, port number can be set with <code>bind()</code> function 

   * <i>typically</i> always done for servers, not done for clients
   * system will choose default if you don't
